body.name: Filano Floating Nightstand White and Gold Wall Mounted Nightstand, Small Bedside Wall Shelves for Bedroom, Wood Floating Bed Side Table/Night Stand 2 Tiers Modern Decor

features: Wall Mounted Nightstand: This floating nightstand features the chic minimalist design with smooth white surface coating and gold plating metal brackets, which goes well with any decor theme. And the simple open-mouth design keep your essentials easy at reach.

Quality Strong Wall Shelf: Measured 16.9 ×7.1 × 8.2 IN, extra long with plenty of storage space. Constructed with 0.6'' thick premium Particle Board and 0.15'' thick quality metal brackets, it is sturdy enough to hold up to 30 lb without any problem.

Versatile Wall Bedside Shelf: Mainly designed and used as a nightstand to solve small bedroom space organizing problem and make floor cleaning a breeze. Also could be a storage and display shelf at living room, office, kitchen to organize plant, picture frames, lamp, mugs, books, phones,etc.

Easy Install : The package comes with a clear instruction ang all necessary hardware, you just need a screwdriver and a hammer. With a simple assembly process, you can easily install this floating nightstand to wall.

NOTICE: Be sure to read through product details carefully before putting an order and check the attachment carefully after receiving the box. Any problem with product feel free to contact and they will be answered and fixed up within 24 hours.

It is perefect for small apartment, small bedroom, entryway, kitchen, bathroom, office study room. 3. What it will bring in my room?. The modern and minilist design looks elegant, quite simple to goes well with your room. It doesn't take up floor space, looks very airy and doesn't make the room look bulky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute, great deal
reviews.reviewText: Not a ton extra to say about it! I needed a floating bedside table because my bed has drawers underneath and anything on the ground would mean the drawers can’t open or is too far away to be useful. I didn’t have a lot to spend, and this works perfectly.Easy to put together!Low profile!Surprisingly sturdy!I’d buy another one and I’d have no qualms recommending it to a friend. It doesn’t FEEL like it would be so sturdy, but it’s really a great deal for the price, style, and function!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Unfinished wood, noisy metal
reviews.reviewText: I liked this well enough. I finished it with tung oil and love the look. Wood is very lightweight. I don't know what kind of wood it is, but light and a little soft. Put in screws carefully.It's a very cool idea, and with a better wood and finish, it would really be great. But if you have the time, put a finish on it, or if you like the raw look and aren't worried about water on the wood, go for it.Cheap enough to try. If you don't like it, you're not out much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this little night table is just perfect!! it's very cute and adds style to my room. love it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use for a night stand for a top bunk. I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute shelf, frustrating construction
reviews.reviewText: I have some positive things to say, but also a few cons.Pros:As you can see in pictures, this is a cute shelf. And it does and looks like what is advertised. It feels sturdy. I'm using it as an office shelf, and it's holding up my plant and a few dishes well. I also like the gold color. I'm picky about gold color looking cheap, but this is nice. However....Cons:The boards of the shelves are a particle board and are covered in a laminate like some cheaper counter tops. It's fine, but not as quality feeling as I'd hoped. But the biggest issue was the design/construction. It was incredibly frustrating. For example, you have to screw the gold grates onto the particle boards (which are pre-drilled). But really, the pre-drilled holes must have not been wide enough because I had to put in a decent amount of elbow grease to screw these on. I don't mind elbow grease except that the gold grates didn't actually allow enough room for the height of my screwdriver (normal length) to fit vertically (see picture)... this led to screw stripping and a fair amount of frustration. Also, instructions could have been clearer. I had to unscrew the position of the gold grating at one point when I realized there was a better order to which shelf should be screwed in first. Hint: screw the top shelf on first, THEN the bottom shelf. I guess if I had thought enough steps ahead, I could have figured it out for myself, but then again better instructions might have helped too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are attractive shelves for a small space. They're not very long or wide, but it does have two levels which helps out. The gold pieces look good and not cheap and the white finish on the boards is pretty good. Assembly is a little different, but not terrible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, easy to hang shelf
reviews.reviewText: Assembly was straightforward-- you choose one of two configurations and attach the boards to the sides, then you mount it to the wall. All of the hardware is included and I only needed assistance to make sure it was level. I'm using the inside part of the shelf for books and the top part has a figurine and candle.
